headline: Align Technology to Host Investor Day on May 6, 2025
summary: TEMPE, Ariz., April 02, 2025--Align Technology, Inc. (Nasdaq: ALGN), a leading global medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign® System of clear aligners, iTero™ intraoral scanners, and exocad™ CAD/CAM software for digital orthodontics and restorative dentistry, announced today that the company will host an in-person Investor Day on Tuesday, May 6, 2025, beginning at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time, and will also be available via a live audio webcast meeting link that w

headline: ALGN Stock Gains From the Invisalign System With Mandibular Advancement
summary: Align Technology's Invisalign System, featuring mandibular advancement with occlusal blocks, is now commercially available for Class II malocclusion in the growing number of patients.
